answers.answer: A friend of mine has been measuring further than she is. They are going to induce her at 37 weeks because if they let her go to 40 weeks, at this rate he will be about 18lbs. She has had no problem except some killer back pain.
Thankyou, hopefully they do the same with me and induce me at 37weeks. Ill let you know how the growth scan goes.

question: At 31weeks we went for a 4D scan and baby was already weighing 4pound 8oz. Im supposed to be 33weeks but im measuring 37-38. Im being sent for a growth scan today. I dont have diabetes etc so is my baby too big? Has this happened to anyone else? Please help, im worried. X
title: help...33weeks measuring 37-38weeks?
